mapper.select: select distinct p.id, p.permission_label, p.pid, p.parent_label, p.permission_code, p.route_path, p.route_name, p.route_url, p.permission_type, p.order_num, p.icon from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.id = #{value} order by p.id, p.order_num

select distinct p.id, p.permission_label, p.pid, p.parent_label, p.permission_code, p.route_path, p.route_name, p.route_url, p.permission_type, p.order_num, p.icon from sys_role r left join sys_role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where r.id = #{value} order by p.id, p.order_num
